TopicTitle: Environmental Visual Enhancements Mod stuck on "Part Upgrades Loading"

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I've been trying to get the EVE mod to work for some time, but every time I install it it seems to get stuck on the loading screen under Part Upgrades Loading. I've tried with other mods installed and with stock KSP.  All other mods I've been using have not had this issue.  Anyone know how to fix this? Thanks.
